about.heading: Hi, I’m Eyder Santiago Suarez Chavez
about.experience: With 12 years of experience, I have honed my skills in both frontend and backend dev, creating dynamic and responsive websites.
about.techStackDescription: I specialize in a variety of languages, frameworks, and tools that allow me to build robust and scalable applications.
about.flexibility: I’m very flexible with time zone communications & locations
about.location: I'm based in Rjieka, Croatia and open to remote work worldwide.
about.passionDescription: I love solving problems and building things through code. Programming isn't just my profession—it's my passion. I enjoy exploring new technologies, and enhancing my skills.

podcastr.title: Podcastr - AI Podcast Platform
podcastr.desc: Podcastr is a revolutionary platform that transforms the way podcasts are created.
podcastr.subdesc: With advanced AI-powered features, it allows creators to generate diverse voiceovers from text.
